name: Flawed Path(Demo)
description:
Unaffected by the disease that has a 90 percent mortality rate, social recluse Rowan hides away in the shelter he built months prior. A year and a half passes and isolation begins to take its toll and he decides for better or worse to go and look for someone to combat the crushing loneliness. 

Script, Music: Sumumfachunk

Artwork: necromew https://www.fiverr.com/necromew?source=order_page_user_message_link

Main menu animation: maxsokal https://www.fiverr.com/maxsokal?source=order_page_summary_seller_link

Most of the backgrounds are free to use from miscellaneous sources.
